user.title: Paw Control Setup
user.description: Set up your Paw Control dog monitoring integration

data_description.name: Displayed under Devices & Services so you can recognize this Paw Control configuration.
data_description.update_interval: How frequently Paw Control refreshes data from configured devices and services.

dogs.title: Add Dogs
dogs.description: Configure the dogs you want to monitor. You can add multiple dogs and customize their settings individually.

data_description.dog_name: Friendly display name used throughout the dashboards and helpers.
data_description.dog_id: Lowercase identifier that becomes part of the entity IDs created for this dog.
data_description.dog_breed: Optional context that helps tailor nutrition and health guidance.
data_description.dog_age: Age in years so Paw Control can suggest appropriate activity and feeding targets.
data_description.dog_weight: Used to calculate meal portions and alert thresholds.
data_description.dog_size: Select the size group that best matches your dog for sensible defaults.

modules.title: Enable Modules
modules.description: Choose which monitoring modules to enable for {dog_name}. You can change these settings later.

data_description.enable_gps: Creates GPS entities and geofencing support for this dog.
data_description.enable_health: Adds health metrics, medication reminders, and vet tracking.
data_description.enable_visitor_mode: Provides quick automations to manage guests and safety mode.
data_description.enable_dashboard: Generates dashboards showcasing this dog's data.
data_description.enable_advanced_features: Turns on performance-intensive analytics intended for power users.
data_description.enable_garden: Tracks garden sessions and related automations.

configure_dashboard.title: Configure Dashboard
configure_dashboard.description:
Set up dashboard settings for {dog_count} dogs.

{dashboard_info}

data_description.auto_create_dashboard: Builds a Lovelace view automatically with recommended cards.
data_description.create_per_dog_dashboards: Generate a separate view for each dog when multiple pets are configured.
data_description.dashboard_theme: Pick the visual theme used for generated dashboards.
data_description.dashboard_template: Choose the layout style that Paw Control should apply.
data_description.dashboard_mode: Set the overall density and amount of detail shown.
data_description.show_statistics: Include historical charts and metrics widgets.
data_description.show_maps: Add map cards for dogs that provide GPS data.
data_description.show_health_charts: Display health-focused charts such as weight and medication history.
data_description.show_feeding_schedule: Expose the shared feeding timeline and reminders.
data_description.show_alerts: Include a panel that lists active alerts and warnings.
data_description.compact_mode: Condense cards and spacing for smaller screens.
data_description.auto_refresh: Keep the dashboard up to date automatically without manual refreshes.
data_description.refresh_interval: How often the generated dashboard should refresh itself.

configure_external_entities.title: Configure External Entities
configure_external_entities.description: Select existing Home Assistant entities that Paw Control will use for GPS tracking, visitor detection, and notifications. This is required for proper integration functionality.

data_description.gps_source: Choose the device tracker or person entity that reports each dog's location.
data_description.door_sensor: Optional contact sensor used to trigger visitor or garden automations.
data_description.notify_fallback: Optional notification service Paw Control uses if targeted channels fail.

gps_setup.title: GPS Configuration
gps_setup.description: Configure GPS tracking settings for {dog_name}. This module provides real-time location monitoring and geofencing.

data_description.gps_source: Hardware or entity that supplies location updates.
data_description.tracking_mode: Defines how aggressively Paw Control requests GPS updates.
data_description.update_interval: Minimum time between GPS polls in seconds.
data_description.accuracy_threshold: Ignore GPS points that report a poorer accuracy than this distance.
data_description.geofence_radius: Safe-zone radius used to trigger leave/enter events.

feeding_setup.title: Feeding Configuration
feeding_setup.description: Set up feeding tracking and reminders for {dog_name}. Configure meal schedules, portion sizes, and dietary preferences.

data_description.daily_food_amount: Total food offered across all meals per day.
data_description.food_type: Label the default food so reminders include the right context.
data_description.feeding_schedule: Choose a preset schedule or indicate that you'll specify custom times.
data_description.reminder_hours: How many hours ahead of a missed meal Paw Control should alert you.

health_setup.title: Health Monitoring
health_setup.description: Configure health tracking settings for {dog_name}. Monitor weight, medications, vet appointments, and overall wellness.

data_description.target_weight: Goal weight used to highlight changes in body condition.
data_description.weight_alert_threshold: Percentage change that should trigger alerts.
data_description.vet_checkup_interval: How often to remind you about routine vet visits.
data_description.activity_tracking: Enable to collect step counts and exercise summaries.

notification_setup.title: Notification Preferences
notification_setup.description: Configure how and when you receive notifications about {dog_name}. Customize alert priorities and delivery methods.

data_description.enable_notifications: Master toggle for all Paw Control alerts.
data_description.notification_priority: Default importance used when sending notifications.
data_description.feeding_alerts: Send reminders when meals are coming up or overdue.
data_description.walk_alerts: Notify you when it's time for scheduled walks or when activity is low.
data_description.health_alerts: Surface medication, vet, and wellness reminders.
data_description.gps_alerts: Alert you when geofence or location events occur.
data_description.quiet_hours_start: Time when Paw Control should stop sending non-critical alerts.

configure_feeding_details.title: Feeding Configuration Details

data_description.daily_food_amount: Default daily quantity applied to dogs that use shared settings.
data_description.meals_per_day: Number of scheduled meals for dogs using the shared template.
data_description.food_type: Primary diet label used for summary cards and reminders.
data_description.special_diet: Document dietary restrictions or preferences shown in reminders.
data_description.feeding_schedule_type: Choose between fixed times, flexible slots, or manual logging.
data_description.portion_calculation: Automatically divide the daily amount into meal portions.
data_description.medication_with_meals: Attach medication reminders to the scheduled meals.
data_description.feeding_reminders: Send alerts when any shared-feeding dog misses a scheduled meal.
data_description.portion_tolerance: Percent variance allowed before a portion is considered off target.

reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate Paw Control

data_description.confirm: Start the reauthentication process and refresh stored credentials.

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure Paw Control

data_description.entity_profile: Select which entity set Paw Control should maintain after reconfiguration.

add_dog.title: Add Dog
add_dog.description: Add a new dog to monitor. Currently configured: {dogs_configured} dog(s).

data_description.dog_name: Friendly label used for entities and dashboards.
data_description.dog_id: Unique identifier in lowercase letters that forms part of entity IDs.
data_description.dog_breed: Optional information that improves nutrition and health hints.
data_description.dog_age: Age in years so activity and meal suggestions scale appropriately.
data_description.dog_weight: Used to compute meal sizes and monitor healthy ranges.
data_description.dog_size: Choose the size group that aligns with the dog's build.

dog_modules.title: Configure Modules
dog_modules.description: Select which modules to enable for your dog. Currently configured: {dogs_configured} dog(s).

data_description.feeding: Creates helpers and sensors to track meals.
data_description.walk: Adds walk history and scheduler entities.
data_description.health: Enables health metrics, medication helpers, and vet reminders.
data_description.gps: Adds GPS entities and geofence automations.
data_description.notifications: Allows Paw Control to send notifications for this dog.

add_another.title: Add Another Dog?

data_description.add_another: Enable to return to the dog form and configure another pet before finishing setup.

entity_profile.title: Select Entity Profile

data_description.entity_profile: Defines the breadth of entities Paw Control will create for the configured dogs.

final_setup.title: Complete Setup
final_setup.description: Setup is complete! Your Paw Control integration is ready to use.

advanced.title: Advanced Settings
advanced.description: Advanced configuration options for power users. These settings fine-tune the integration behavior.

data_description.performance_mode: Adjust how aggressively Paw Control refreshes data and schedules jobs. Defaults to the balanced mode; legacy "standard" values map here automatically.
data_description.data_retention_days: Number of days Paw Control keeps historical records before pruning.
data_description.export_enabled: Enable to allow exporting data snapshots for external analysis.
data_description.api_endpoint: Optional external API base URL for third-party integrations.
data_description.webhook_url: Webhook target that receives notable events, if configured.
data_description.debug_logging: Turn on verbose logging to troubleshoot issues.

configure_modules.title: Configure Global Settings

data_description.performance_mode: Choose how aggressively Paw Control should refresh data based on your setup size. Defaults to balanced and automatically normalises legacy "standard" entries.
data_description.enable_analytics: Aggregate anonymous trends across all dogs to power summary widgets.
data_description.enable_cloud_backup: Export Paw Control data to your configured cloud storage automatically.
data_description.data_retention_days: How long to keep historical metrics before they are purged.
data_description.debug_logging: Turn on verbose logs while troubleshooting setup or device issues.

data_description.add_another: Select to return to the dog form and configure another pet. Leave disabled to continue.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Paw Control service
error.invalid_dog_id: Dog ID must be unique and contain only letters, numbers, and underscores
error.invalid_weight: Weight must be between {min_weight} and {max_weight} kg
error.invalid_age: Age must be between {min_age} and {max_age} years
error.duplicate_dog: A dog with this ID already exists
error.no_dogs_configured: At least one dog must be configured
error.module_dependency: GPS module is required for walk tracking
error.invalid_schedule: Invalid feeding or walk schedule format
error.gps_entity_not_found: The selected GPS source entity was not found
error.gps_entity_unavailable: The selected GPS source entity is unavailable
error.door_sensor_not_found: The selected door sensor entity was not found
error.door_sensor_update_failed: Unable to save the door sensor configuration
error.notification_service_not_found: The selected notification service was not found
error.invalid_notification_service: The notification service format is invalid
error.invalid_profile: You need to select a valid profile
error.profile_unchanged: You're already using this profile. Choose a different profile to continue.

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only one instance of Paw Control is allowed

init.title: Paw Control Options
init.description: Modify integration settings and dog configurations

dogs.title: Dog Management
dogs.description: Add, remove, or modify dog configurations

add_dog.title: Add New Dog
add_dog.description: Add a new dog to monitor

notifications.title: Notification Settings
notifications.description: Configure notification preferences and delivery methods

data.title: Data Management
data.description: Manage data storage, export, and cleanup options

system_settings.title: System Settings
system_settings.description: Configure retention, analytics, and backups for Paw Control

data_description.reset_time: Choose when Paw Control performs daily maintenance tasks.
data_description.data_retention_days: How long Paw Control keeps historical metrics before pruning.
data_description.auto_backup: Schedule local exports before retention cleanup runs.
data_description.enable_analytics: Aggregate anonymous trends across all dogs to power summary widgets.
data_description.enable_cloud_backup: Upload configuration snapshots to your configured cloud target.
data_description.resilience_skip_threshold: Number of skipped guard executions before the escalation script raises an alert (0 disables guard escalations).
data_description.resilience_breaker_threshold: Open or half-open breaker count that triggers escalation follow-ups (0 disables breaker escalations).
data_description.manual_check_event: Event type that triggers an on-demand resilience check. Leave blank to disable manual checks. Known values: {manual_check_event_options}.
data_description.manual_guard_event: Event type that triggers guard follow-up actions on demand. Leave blank to disable manual guard escalations. Known values: {manual_guard_event_options}.
data_description.manual_breaker_event: Event type that triggers breaker follow-up actions on demand. Leave blank to disable manual breaker escalations. Known values: {manual_breaker_event_options}.
data_description.performance_mode: Select how aggressively Paw Control refreshes data and schedules jobs.

error.cannot_delete_last_dog: Cannot delete the last configured dog
error.invalid_notification_service: Selected notification service is not available
error.invalid_payload: Import payload could not be validated
error.payload_not_mapping: Import payload must be a JSON object
error.unsupported_version: This export file was created with an unsupported version
error.options_missing: Import payload is missing configuration options
error.dogs_invalid: Import payload must include a list of dogs
error.dog_invalid: Each imported dog entry must be a JSON object
error.dog_missing_id: Each imported dog must include a unique ID
error.dog_invalid_modules: Dog module settings could not be interpreted
error.dog_duplicate: Duplicate dog IDs detected in the import file

feed_dog.name: Feed Dog
feed_dog.description: Log feeding for a specific dog

start_walk.name: Start Walk
start_walk.description: Begin tracking a walk for a specific dog

end_walk.name: End Walk
end_walk.description: End the current walk for a specific dog

log_health.name: Log Health Data
log_health.description: Log health information for a specific dog

log_medication.name: Log Medication
log_medication.description: Log medication administration for a specific dog

start_grooming.name: Start Grooming
start_grooming.description: Begin a grooming session for a specific dog

update_location.name: Update Location
update_location.description: Manually update the location of a specific dog

set_visitor_mode.name: Set Visitor Mode
set_visitor_mode.description: Enable or disable visitor mode for a specific dog

notify_test.name: Test Notification
notify_test.description: Send a test notification for a specific dog

acknowledge_notification.name: Acknowledge notification
acknowledge_notification.description: Mark a PawControl notification as acknowledged

reset_daily_stats.name: Reset Daily Statistics
reset_daily_stats.description: Reset daily statistics for a specific dog

export_data.name: Export Data
export_data.description: Export historical data for a specific dog

import_data.name: Import Data
import_data.description: Import historical data for a specific dog

set_feeding_schedule.name: Set Feeding Schedule
set_feeding_schedule.description: Configure feeding schedule for a specific dog

set_walk_schedule.name: Set Walk Schedule
set_walk_schedule.description: Configure walk schedule for a specific dog

configure_alerts.name: Configure Alerts
configure_alerts.description: Configure alert settings for a specific dog

generate_report.name: Generate Report
generate_report.description: Generate a comprehensive report for a specific dog

walk_not_in_progress.message: No walk is currently in progress for this dog

walk_already_in_progress.message: A walk is already in progress for this dog

invalid_weight.message: Weight must be a positive number

grooming_not_in_progress.message: No grooming session is currently in progress

gps_unavailable.message: GPS data is not available for this dog

module_not_enabled.message: The required module is not enabled for this dog

missing_dog_configuration.title: Add at least one dog
missing_dog_configuration.description: Paw Control needs at least one dog profile. Configure a dog to continue. Dogs configured: {dogs_count}.

duplicate_dog_ids.title: Duplicate dog IDs detected
duplicate_dog_ids.description: The following IDs are used more than once: {duplicate_ids}. Each of the {total_dogs} dogs must have a unique ID.

invalid_dog_data.title: Incomplete dog details
invalid_dog_data.description: Some dogs are missing required information: {invalid_dogs}. Provide a name and ID for each of the {total_dogs} dogs.

door_sensor_persistence_failure.title: Door sensor settings could not be saved
door_sensor_persistence_failure.description: Paw Control could not persist the door sensor configuration for {dog_name} ({dog_id}). Sensor: {door_sensor}. Error: {error}. Last attempt: {timestamp}.

invalid_gps_configuration.title: GPS source missing
invalid_gps_configuration.description: GPS tracking is enabled for {gps_enabled_dogs} dog(s), but no GPS source is selected. Choose a GPS source in the options.

missing_notification_config.title: Notification service unavailable
missing_notification_config.description: The {missing_service} notification service is not available. {notification_enabled_dogs} dog(s) rely on this service.

outdated_configuration.title: Update the configuration entry
outdated_configuration.description: The configuration entry uses version {current_version}. Update it to version {required_version} through the options flow.

performance_warning.title: Performance tuning recommended
performance_warning.description: You configured {dog_count} dogs, which may affect performance. The recommended maximum is {recommended_max}.

gps_update_interval_warning.title: GPS updates are too frequent
gps_update_interval_warning.description: The GPS update interval is {current_interval} seconds. Increase it to at least {recommended_interval} seconds to reduce load.

storage_warning.title: Storage retention is too long
storage_warning.description: Data retention is set to {current_retention} days. Reduce it to {recommended_max} days to keep the database lean.

module_configuration_conflict.title: Too many intensive modules enabled
module_configuration_conflict.description: {intensive_dogs} dog(s) use all intensive modules out of {total_dogs} configured. Disable some modules or enable performance mode.

coordinator_error.title: Coordinator is unavailable
coordinator_error.description: Paw Control could not access its coordinator ({error}). Follow the suggested action or reload the integration.

reconfigure_warnings.title: Profile change produced warnings
reconfigure_warnings.description: The last reconfigure at {timestamp} switched from {previous_profile} to {requested_profile}, but compatibility checks reported: {warnings}.

reconfigure_health.title: Health issues after reconfigure
reconfigure_health.description: The last reconfigure at {timestamp} for profile {requested_profile} reported issues: {health_issues}. Additional warnings: {health_warnings}.

feeding_compliance_alert.title: Feeding compliance issues for {dog_name}
feeding_compliance_alert.description: The latest feeding compliance check covering {days_to_check} days scored {compliance_score}% with {issue_count} issue(s) and {missed_meal_count} missed meal(s). Key findings: {issue_summary}. Missed meals: {missed_meal_summary}. Next steps: {recommendations_summary}. Checked at {checked_at}.

feeding_compliance_no_data.title: Feeding telemetry missing for {dog_name}
feeding_compliance_no_data.description: The latest feeding compliance check covering {days_to_check} days could not generate a report: {message}.

common.setup_flags_panel_description: Analytics, backup, and debug logging toggles captured during onboarding and options flows.
